name: biurad/biurad-loader
description: This dependency is a robust package for loading files, classes, class aliases, annotations, and store data

suggest.doctrine/annotations: Support to use annotations loading feature in project
suggest.symfony/yaml: Support loading files in yml or yaml format, if native yaml extension is not avaliable
suggest.nette/neon: Support loading files in neon format, since nette/neon is an advanced version of yaml
